Uses of Interface
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing.TraceMap

  • Packages that use TraceMap 
    Package Description
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.history
    API for storing and retrieving flow trace information, in the form of FlowEvents emitted during flow execution.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing
    Provides the API for tracing of flow execution.

    • Uses of TraceMap in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.history

      Methods in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.history that return TraceMap 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TraceMap FlowHistory.getTraceMap()
      Get a TraceMap representing all of the possible execution paths for this flow.
      TraceMap TraceMapRepository.getTraceMap(UUID flowId)
      Fetch the TraceMap associated with the given flow id.
      Methods in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.history with parameters of type TraceMap 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TraceMapRepository.storeTraceMap(UUID flowId, TraceMap traceMap)
      Store the TraceMap for the given flow id.
      void FlowHistoryRepository.storeTraceMap(UUID flowId, TraceMap traceMap)
      Store the TraceMap giving a map of all of the flow's possible execution paths.

    • Uses of TraceMap in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing

      Methods in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing that return TraceMap 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TraceMap TracedFlowExecution.getTraceMap()
      Get a trace map of the flow that will be executed.
      TraceMap TracedAction.getTraceMap()
      Get the trace map to which trace events emitted by this action refer.
      Methods in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing that return types with arguments of type TraceMap 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<TraceMap> TraceMap.getChildren()
      Get the children of the mapped flow step.
